front.title: Framework for real-time text over IP using SIP

abstract.t: This document provides a framework for the implementation of real- time text conversation over the IP network using the Session Initiation Protocol and the Real-Time Transport Protocol. It lists the essential requirements for real-time Text-over-IP (ToIP) and defines a framework for implementation of all required functions based on existing protocols and techniques. This includes interworking between Text-over-IP and existing text telephony on the PSTN and other networks.
